Nexus Modern Sorcery (PBTA)
Genre : Modern Supernatural. Mobile Phones, Mercedes, Magic and Monsters! System : Powered by the Apocalypse. Tropes : Double Life, Environmentalism, Fantasy, Hidden World, Magic, Reincarnation, Supernatural. Fiction Touchstones : Neverwhere-Neil Gaiman, Fairy Tail-Anime, Stargate-Atlantis.
